description.value: Starting at 2nd level, your quick thinking and agility allow you to move and act quickly. You can take a bonus action on each of your turns in combat. This action can be used only to take the @action[Dash], @action[Disengage], or @action[Hide] action.

magicitems.destroyFlavorText: reaches 0 charges: it crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.
